text: The Sacramento Kings are an American professional basketball team in the National Basketball Association (NBA) in Sacramento, California. They began playing in the National Basketball Association in 1948. They play their home games at Golden 1 Center (Their last arena being Sleep Train Arena (formally known as Arco Arena)). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:National Basketball Association teams Category:Sacramento, California Category:1948 establishments in California
title: Sacramento Kings
